channel.title: üè¢ Zhejiang University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Zhejiang University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Consistency-Aware Spot-Guided Transformer for Versatile and Hierarchical Point Cloud Registration
item.description: CAST: a novel consistency-aware spot-guided Transformer achieves state-of-the-art accuracy and efficiency in point cloud registration.

item.title: Advancing Training Efficiency of Deep Spiking Neural Networks through Rate-based Backpropagation
item.description: Rate-based backpropagation boosts deep spiking neural network training efficiency by leveraging rate coding, achieving comparable performance to BPTT with reduced complexity.

item.title: Approximated Orthogonal Projection Unit: Stabilizing Regression Network Training Using Natural Gradient
item.description: AOPU: A novel neural network achieves superior stability in regression network training by approximating the natural gradient, minimizing variance estimation, and enhancing robustness.

item.title: Context and Geometry Aware Voxel Transformer for Semantic Scene Completion
item.description: CGFormer: a novel voxel transformer boosting semantic scene completion accuracy by using context-aware queries and 3D deformable attention, outperforming existing methods on SemanticKITTI and SSCBench…

item.title: Continuously Learning, Adapting, and Improving: A Dual-Process Approach to Autonomous Driving
item.description: LeapAD, a novel autonomous driving paradigm, uses a dual-process architecture mirroring human cognition to achieve continuous learning and improved adaptability. Employing a VLM for efficient scene u…

item.title: Enhancing LLM Reasoning via Vision-Augmented Prompting
item.description: Vision-Augmented Prompting (VAP) boosts LLM reasoning by automatically generating images from textual problem descriptions, incorporating visual-spatial clues to significantly improve accuracy across …

item.title: Enhancing Semi-Supervised Learning via Representative and Diverse Sample Selection
item.description: RDSS: a novel sample selection method for semi-supervised learning, boosts model accuracy by minimizing a-MMD, striking a balance between sample representativeness and diversity.

item.title: MKGL: Mastery of a Three-Word Language
item.description: Researchers taught a large language model (LLM) a three-word ‘Knowledge Graph Language’ (KGL) to improve knowledge graph (KG) completion, drastically reducing errors compared to other methods.

item.title: Model LEGO: Creating Models Like Disassembling and Assembling Building Blocks
item.description: Model LEGO (MDA) revolutionizes deep learning by enabling the creation of new models by assembling and disassembling task-aware components from pre-trained models, eliminating the need for retraining.

item.title: On Convergence of Adam for Stochastic Optimization under Relaxed Assumptions
item.description: Adam optimizer achieves near-optimal convergence in non-convex scenarios with unbounded gradients and relaxed noise assumptions, improving its theoretical understanding and practical application.

item.title: Scene Graph Generation with Role-Playing Large Language Models
item.description: SDSGG outperforms leading scene graph generation methods by using LLMs to create scene-specific descriptions, adapting to diverse visual relations.

item.title: Solving Zero-Sum Markov Games with Continous State via Spectral Dynamic Embedding
item.description: SDEPO, a new natural policy gradient algorithm, efficiently solves zero-sum Markov games with continuous state spaces, achieving near-optimal convergence independent of state space cardinality.

item.title: TOPA: Extending Large Language Models for Video Understanding via Text-Only Pre-Alignment
item.description: TOPA: Extending LLMs for video understanding using only text data.

item.title: Towards Unified Multimodal Editing with Enhanced Knowledge Collaboration
item.description: UniKE: A unified multimodal editing method achieves superior reliability, generality, and locality by disentangling knowledge into semantic and truthfulness spaces, enabling enhanced collaboration bet…

item.title: Unified Generative and Discriminative Training for Multi-modal Large Language Models
item.description: Unified generative-discriminative training boosts multimodal large language models (MLLMs)! Sugar, a novel approach, leverages dynamic sequence alignment and a triple kernel to enhance global and fin…

item.title: Vision-Language Navigation with Energy-Based Policy
item.description: Energy-based Navigation Policy (ENP) revolutionizes Vision-Language Navigation by modeling joint state-action distributions, achieving superior performance across diverse benchmarks.
